thread.title_full: One of Katy Perry‚Äôs dancers fell off the stage during her BRIT Awards performance, and people couldn‚Äôt handle it

author: Alim Kheraj
title: One of Katy Perry‚Äôs dancers fell off the stage during her BRIT Awards performance, and people couldn‚Äôt handle it
text:
One of Katy Perry‚Äôs dancers fell off the stage during her BRIT Awards performance, and people couldn‚Äôt handle it At yesterday‚Äôs BRIT Awards, Purposeful Pop singer Katy Perry gave another rousing performance of her political pop song ‚ÄúChained To The Rhythm.‚Äù However, there was one moment in particular that has gripped the internet:
One of Katy Perry‚Äôs dancers fell off the stage dressed as a house, and people can‚Äôt handle it. Following on from her Grammys performanc e, Katy Perry gave another charged political show of her new single, ‚ÄúChained To The Rhythm, ‚Äù yesterday (February 22nd), in which she took aim at the two leaders of America and the U.K .
Continuing the theme of the Grammy‚Äôs performance, Perry was joined on stage by a bunch of dancers dressed as white houses, and it‚Äôs one of these houses that has got people on the internet particularly excited.
I can't cope with one of Katy Perry's many houses falling off stage pic.twitter.com/n5gaokDxIu 
‚Äî Gary Pounder (@GaryPounder) February 22, 2017 In fact, the falling house has been named the new Left Shark.
I want to know if the Katy Perry house that fell of the stage last night was the same dancer as left shark #BRITs2017 
‚Äî Sian Roberts (@_Sian_Roberts) February 23, 2017 FIRST THE LEFT SHARK AND NOW THE FALLING HOUSE, I LOVE THIS FANDOM @katyperry 
‚Äî calu (@katycxt) February 23, 2017 Imagine upstaging Katy Perry at #TheBritAwards by falling off stage dressed as a house..
‚Äî Bailey Shaw (@_Baileyshaw) February 23, 2017 Lot‚Äôs of people found the falling house pretty darn relatable.
i relate to katy perry's falling house tbh
‚Äî alishia (@homicidalmxniac) February 23, 2017 That Katy Perry falling house reminds me of a similar event happening to me, at infant school, but dressed as a Christmas cracker 
‚Äî Lucy Alice (@lucitelu) February 22, 2017 Most accurate representation of my life is that house falling off the stage during Katy Perry's performance
‚Äî Dom (@DomDomWhatWhat) February 22, 2017 Mood: The house falling during Katy Perry's Brit performance pic.twitter.com/OcNN2NCEwr 
‚Äî Jas ü•Ä (@fo0lsforyou) February 22, 2017 mood: the house that fell off during katy perry's performance #BRITs2017 
‚Äî will (@collleensings) February 22, 2017 Some even linked the falling house to the housing crises.
The #Brits is tackling current affairs with music. The fall of the housing market shown by @katyperry 's walking house falling off the stage
‚Äî Dave Murphy (@ProducerDaveFM) February 22, 2017 Love way @katyperry weaves political messages into her songs & performances. Was the house falling off stage representing #ukhousing crisis? https://t.co/AXcADG8oYw 
‚Äî Lisa Pickard (@lyha_LisaP) February 22, 2017 Every millennial hoping house prices crash this hard #brits #BRITs2017 https://t.co/ZAYO3xOl0U 
‚Äî Matt Richardson (@MattRichardson3) February 22, 2017 @katyperry is beautiful but has left me confused. I thought she was telling us a/b housing market/mortgages w/all those bloody houses. 
‚Äî Amelia Murray (@ameliamurrayx) February 22, 2017 The dancing houses also had another hilarious moment after the performance, too.
Fave moment of the #Brits so far: the two houses from @Katy Perry's performance trying to go unnoticed as they sneaked past Rossy and Naomi
‚Äî Matt Bagwell (@BaggersBites) February 22, 2017 When you're trying to sneak into the #BRITs After Party... pic.twitter.com/rZIuk7Wy8O 
‚Äî BRIT Awards (@BRITs) February 22, 2017 Amazing.
Meanwhile, Katy Perry announced that she wasn‚Äôt planning to release her fourth album anytime soon. 
‚ÄúI‚Äôve got something swirling, but, you know, I think I want to put out some songs first before I give them the full meal,‚Äù she said.
